## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G03140](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G03140)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>LecRK-VIII.2</u>
- **Gene Name:** L-type lectin receptor kinase VIII.2
- **Description:**   Concanavalin A-like lectin protein kinase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
